title: Hello World: The Future of Static CMS
content:
# Welcome to the Future

This is a demonstration of a **Serverless CMS** that runs entirely in the browser.

## How it works
1. Content is stored as JSON files on GitHub.
2. The specific viewer fetches them on demand.
3. Admin panel commits changes directly to the repo.

> "Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication." - Leonardo da Vinci
